head.title: Footlights; Design for New Theater Unveiled

hedline.hl1: Footlights; Design for New Theater Unveiled

abstract.p: McCarter Theater and Princeton University unveil design by Hugh Hardy of Hardy Holzman Pfeiffer Associates for exterior of Berlind Theater, named in honor of Broadway producer Roger S Berlind; drawing (S)

block.p: The McCarter Theater and Princeton University unveiled the design for the exterior of the Berlind Theater last week.

Hugh Hardy of the architectural firm Hardy Holzman Pfeiffer Associates designed the 350-seat theater, named in honor of the Broadway producer Roger S. Berlind. Mr. Berlind, who donated $3.5 million for the $10.5 million project, was a member of Princeton's Class of 1952.
The McCarter Theater and Princeton University unveiled the design for the exterior of the Berlind Theater last week.

Hugh Hardy of the architectural firm Hardy Holzman Pfeiffer Associates designed the 350-seat theater, named in honor of the Broadway producer Roger S. Berlind. Mr. Berlind, who donated $3.5 million for the $10.5 million project, was a member of Princeton's Class of 1952.

''This new theater will not only provide a more intimate second stage for McCarter's program, but will also permit a closer integration between McCarter and the university's programs in theater and dance,'' Mr. Hardy said.
The design for the interior of the theater has yet to be completed.
